text: Keiten'notami no nakaniha, anata ga senkin o takushite mo kore o kaesu mono mo areba, anata ga fudan ni saisoku shinai kagiri, ichi-mai no ginka o takushite mo kaesanai mono mo aru. Sore wa kare-ra ga `muchi no mono-tachi ni tsuite wa, watashi-tachi ni seme wanai.' To iu tamedearu. Kare-ra wa koi ni, arrÄ ni kyogi o kataru monodearu
